alert.note: Alert for Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 04 at 10:42PM EST until March 12 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Missouri...Indiana... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. Ohio River at Paducah. Ohio River at Cairo. Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. Ohio River at Shawneetown. Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. Ohio River at Mount Vernon. .Runoff from recent heavy rain is forecast to send the Ohio River above flood stage at several points over the next week. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING TO SUNDAY, MARCH 12... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. * WHEN...From Sunday evening to Sunday, March 12. * IMPACTS...At 37.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly bottomland and surrounding low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CST Saturday the stage was 32.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 39.5 feet early Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
